files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
root = true

[*]
charset = utf-8
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2
end_of_line = lf
insert_final_newline = true
trim_trailing_whitespace = true

files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
.DS_Store
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

package-lock.json
# Editor directories and files
.idea
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln

files.name: .npmignore
files.content:
.DS_Store
docs/
npm-debug.log

files.name: README.md
files.content:
# vue-dropzone

**CO-MAINTAINERS WANTED**
This component has far outgrown my initial expectations and I'm not able to provide the amount of support that users require. If you'd like to help out with it's maintenance drop a [note on this issue](https://github.com/rowanwins/vue-dropzone/issues/473)

A Vue component for file uploads, powered by [Dropzone.js](http://www.dropzonejs.com/). [Check out the demo](https://rowanwins.github.io/vue-dropzone/docs/dist/index.html).

A **Nuxt SSR-compatible** component can be found at [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/nuxt-dropzone) and [github](https://github.com/Etheryte/nuxt-dropzone). Thanks to [@Etheryte](https://github.com/Etheryte)

---

![](https://i.imgur.com/kUbjks1.gif)

## Development

``` bash
# install your dependencies
npm install

# install vue-dropzone
npm install vue2-dropzone

(or with yarn)

yarn add vue2-dropzone

# Execute dependencies script 
npm run dev

# serve example and docs at localhost:8080
npm run start

# build any changes made
npm run build
```

files.name: package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "vue2-dropzone",
  "description": "A wrapper around Dropzone.js for Vue 2",
  "author": "rowanwins <@rowanwins>",
  "contributors": [
    "Vaibhavraj Roham <@vrajroham>",
    "Alexander Wennerstr√∏m <@AlexanderYW>"
  ],
  "version": "3.6.0",
  "license": "MIT",
  "main": "./dist/vue2Dropzone.js",
  "repository": "git@github.com:rowanwins/vue-dropzone.git",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.3.4",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.3.4",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.5",
    "babel-plugin-external-helpers": "^6.22.0",
    "cross-env": "^5.2.0",
    "css-loader": "^2.1.1",
    "file-loader": "^3.0.1",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^3.2.0",
    "less-loader": "^4.1.0",
    "marked": "^0.3.19",
    "prismjs": "^1.15.0",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.3",
    "rollup": "^1.6.0",
    "rollup-plugin-buble": "^0.19.6",
    "rollup-plugin-butternut": "^0.1.0",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^9.2.1",
    "rollup-plugin-css-only": "^1.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-less": "^1.1.2",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^4.0.1",
    "rollup-plugin-replace": "^2.1.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^4.0.4",
    "rollup-plugin-vue": "^4.7.2",
    "serve": "^10.1.1",
    "uglifycss": "0.0.29",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^2.1.2",
    "vue": "^2.6.8",
    "vue-loader": "^15.7.0",
    "vue-router": "^3.0.2",
    "vue-style-loader": "^4.1.2",
    "vue-template-compiler": "^2.6.8",
    "webpack": "^4.29.6",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.2.3",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^3.2.1"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c",
    "build-docs": "npm run clean-docs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --progress --hide-modules",
    "clean-docs": "rimraf docs/dist",
    "dev": "rollup -c -w",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run build",
    "start": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --hot"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "dropzone": "^5.5.1"
  }
}

files.name: rollup.config.js
webpack.config.js
